course.subject: MATH
course.name: Independent Study: Algorithmic Game Theory
course.description: This  is a reading course on algorithmic game theory. Students will read  selected chapters from the textbook Karlin, A. R., & Peres, Y. (2017). Game theory, alive (Vol. 101). American Mathematical Society along with other handouts. Students will be marked based on submitted solutions to assigned problems. Students should seek instructor's approval to take this course.
